features.title: Accordion
features.description: An accordion component for collapsing sections.

features.title: Alerts
features.description: Display feedback messages with background colors, margins, and padding.

features.title: Badges
features.description: Display badges that can be used for notifications or categorization.

features.title: Breadcrumb
features.description: Navigation component for showing the user's current location within a site.

features.title: Buttons
features.description: Create responsive buttons with various styles.

features.title: Button Group
features.description: Group multiple buttons together for a unified style.

features.title: Cards
features.description: Responsive card component for displaying content.

features.title: Carousel
features.description: A carousel component for image or content sliders.

features.title: Collapse
features.description: A collapsible component for hiding and showing content.

features.title: Dropdowns
features.description: Create dropdown menus for displaying additional options.

features.title: Figure
features.description: A figure component for displaying images or other media with optional captions.

features.title: Responsive Images in Figure
features.description: A figure component with multiple responsive images for different screen sizes.

features.title: List Group
features.description: Create a group of items with the option to add styles and interactivity.

features.title: Modals
features.description: Create modals for overlay content like forms, alerts, etc.

features.title: Navs and Tabs
features.description: Create responsive navigation bars and tabbed navigation for your application.

features.title: Navbar
features.description: A responsive Navbar that collapses on small screens.

features.title: Offcanvas
features.description: An offcanvas component for sliding menus or hidden content.

features.title: Pagination
features.description: Add pagination controls for navigating through multiple pages of content.

features.title: Placeholders
features.description: Use placeholders to show loading content in a responsive manner.

features.title: Popovers
features.description: Use popovers for additional information or details on hover or click.

features.title: Progress
features.description: A progress bar to show the status of a task.

features.title: Scrollspy
features.description: A scrollspy component for highlighting the active section as the user scrolls.

features.title: Spinners
features.description: A loading spinner to indicate an ongoing process.

features.title: Toasts
features.description: Toasts for quick, non-intrusive notifications.

features.title: Tooltips
features.description: Tooltips to provide additional information on hover.

features.title: Footer
features.description: A simple footer component.

features.title: Header Component
features.description: A responsive header with a logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.

features.title: Input Field
features.description: A reusable input field component with label.

features.title: Login Page
features.description: A login page with fields for username/email and password.

features.title: Signup Page
features.description: A signup page with fields for creating an account.

features.title: Shop Page
features.description: A page displaying products for sale.

features.title: Cart Page
features.description: A cart page displaying products added to the cart.

features.title: Checkout Page
features.description: A simple checkout page where users can review their order and input payment details.

features.title: Product Details Page
features.description: A page that displays detailed information about a product.

features.title: Order Confirmation Page
features.description: A page that confirms the user's order after checkout.

features.title: User Profile Page
features.description: A page displaying the user's profile information with an option to edit.

features.title: 404 Not Found Page
features.description: A page displayed when the user navigates to a non-existing route.

features.title: Contact Us Page
features.description: A contact page with a form to reach out to the support team.

features.title: Order History Page
features.description: A page that shows a list of previous orders made by the user.

features.title: Pricing Page with Packages
features.description: A page that displays multiple packages or offers, ideal for subscription-based services or products.

features.description: A table-style pricing page that displays the features of different plans or packages.

features.title: Feature Comparison Table
features.description: A table that compares features across multiple plans.

features.description: A section to choose from a range of pricing packages, ideal for SaaS applications.

features.title: Testimonial Section
features.description: A section displaying testimonials from customers or clients.

features.title: Blog Post Previews
features.description: A preview section displaying recent blog posts with titles, descriptions, and images.

features.title: Hero Section with CTA
features.description: A prominent hero section with a call-to-action button.

features.title: Feature Section with Icons
features.description: A section with a list of features, each accompanied by an icon.

features.title: Testimonials Carousel
features.description: A carousel that rotates through multiple customer testimonials.

features.title: Contact Us Form
features.description: A simple contact form with name, email, and message fields.

features.title: Image Gallery
features.description: A responsive image gallery displaying images in a grid.

features.title: FAQ Section
features.description: A collapsible FAQ section with questions and answers.

features.title: Newsletter Signup
features.description: A simple form for users to sign up for a newsletter.

features.title: Feature List
features.description: A list of features or key selling points for a product or service.

features.title: Call-to-Action Section
features.description: A prominent call-to-action section for driving user actions.

features.title: Footer with Social Media Links
features.description: A footer containing social media links and other footer content.
